summary:
Adds a door and secret door to Markarth leading to Markarth Ruins. The main door is in Vlindrill Hall. The secret will be marked on your map, near the entrance to Markarth. 

This is a player home where you can store your stuff craft. I still have lots to implement and bugs to fix, so keep an eye on this ;D

Updated daily, so endorse and downlo
descriptionHtml:
Adds a door and secret door to Markarth leading to Markarth Ruins. The main door is in Vlindrill Hall. The secret will be marked on your map, near the entrance to Markarth. 

This is a player home where you can store your stuff craft. I still have lots to implement and bugs to fix, so keep an eye on this ;D

Updated daily, so endorse and download to keep me going! :D

Patch Notes
---------------

0.3b - Fixed missing walls near exit. Added door to entrance. Changed name and renamed map marker and instance.
0.3a - Added an Alchemy and Enchanting lab with chests and satchels. Fixed some lighting, added stairs to soon to be new area (and to avoid you getting stuck)
0.3 - Fixed exit walls missing. Added stairs to second floor. Added 3 Mannequins, added elder scrolls and other cool shit. Fixed lighting. Added a table near smithing with some crap on. Added naked woman to the skyforge. Midget falmer
0.2b1 - Hotfix
0.2b - Added a secret entrance outside Markarth and a Map marker. Fixed the exit door.
0.2a - Fixed the door issue, fixed the Skyforge not showing.
0.2 - Added a blacksmithing area with the skyforge, added a falmer, added a switch for later use.
0.1b - Cleaned the ruins some more and added a bridge and more torches
0.1a - Made the Mod, cleaned up the ruins
author: Pruney
